body_html:
The fix in #584 causes a new error locally

Can you confirm that it's really just locally? What are the steps to reproduce it?

Or do we need another approach?

I think so, yes. We've had quite a few bugs/regressions with the conferences and obviously our test coverage isn't the best in that department. Maybe a helper class that gets conference data for a user (including the formatting, re: weird comma errors) without relying on the underlying Attendance system?
